title: BMI Calculator
description: Create a program that calculates a person's BMI based on their weight and height. If the BMI is under 18.5, the person is underweight. If the BMI is between 18.5 and 24.9, the person is normal weight. If the BMI is between 25 and 29.9, the person is overweight. If the BMI is 30 or above, the person is obese.
sample_output: Your BMI is 22.9. You are normal weight
